short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Rapnet's Extension one-click Layout Creator - End one by one searching! Create multiple Diamond Layouts in a breeze

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Our extension for Rapnet.com streamlines the process of searching and purchasing multiple diamonds at once. It eliminates the need for manual searching (one by one) by providing a one-click solution to find the cheapest diamonds of the lot or from specific sellers. The extension also displays the most common measurements, making it easy for users to find the diamonds that meet their specific needs. This extension is perfect for anyone on Rapnet that is looking to purchase multiple diamonds and create Diamond Layouts quickly and easily
